name: Robo-Parto - Start With NOTHING
description:
Play Robo-Parto, Start with Nothing and Try to get everything he wants in this short story based 2d platformer. 

  • Experience a Short Story
  • 2D Graphics
  • Start with Nothing
  • An Interactive 2D Platforming Experience
  • Short Length Gameplay

A robot gets attacked and gets landed in Robo Hospital where he finds that his robo body organs are removed and stealed. Experience the short adventure of the robot where he tries to find all his lost body organs and find the "Start with Nothing" experience in Robo-Parto: Start With Nothing.

I participated in my first game jam by developing this game Robo-Parto for Ludum Dare 45. 

Known Issues/Bugs:

Issues related to colliders(energy ball and enemy)

Sometimes, buggy animations and movement.

Note: In each update, reported bugs are being fixed, so play the latest version to get a better experience.
